title: LEGOLAS Research - Johns Hopkins University
short_description: Built autonomous ML-based robot for solar cell optimization at Johns Hopkins Entropy for Energy Lab
full_description: Research Intern at Johns Hopkins University's Entropy for Energy Lab. Built autonomous ML-based robot for solar cell optimization. Programmed robotic controls and Gaussian Process/Bayesian ML model. Reduced number of iterations to find optimal composition by 32%. Co-authored paper with Dr. Oses, Assistant Professor (Publication Pending). Presented findings to IIT Professors in ICCW Department.
highlights: Autonomous robot for solar cell testing

links.text: Entropy for Energy Laboratory, Johns Hopkins University
Dr. Corey Oses, My Research Advisor
